meanings.definition: The state of being close to someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The proximity of the siblings was evident in how they always finished each other's sentences.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the proximity of the grocery store to my apartment, as it saves me time.
meanings.sent3: The proximity of the cat to the fishbowl always led to some playful antics.
meanings.sent4: The proximity of the old oak tree to the house provided a sense of security and comfort.
meanings.sent5: The proximity of the campfire warmed us as we sat around it, sharing stories.
